summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS DO NOT FUNCTION AT ALL TIMES.  WILL STOP WHILE DRIVING.  ONE SUCH INCIDENT , I WAS DRIVING ON AN INTERSTATE HIGHWAY AT 70 MPH WHEN THEY STOPPED, NEARLY CAUSING AN ACCIDENT.  LUCKILY, I WAS ABLE TO PULL OFF THE ROAD AND WAIT FOR THE RAIN TO STOP BEFORE PROCEEDING.  WIPERS STARTED WORKING AGAIN SHORTLY AFTER THAT.  *JB
